item.title: Mahaparinirvan Diwas observed in Raichur, Yadgir
item.description:
<![CDATA[Mahaparinirvan Diwas was observed to commemorate the death anniversary of B.R. Ambedkar in Yadgir and Raichur on Saturday.
MLA Channareddy Patil Tunnur garlanded the statue of B.R. Ambedkar at a programme held in Yadgir. Mr. Tunnur said Dr. Ambedkar was a great lawyer, economist, social reformer, freedom fighter, and architect of the Indian Constitution under which every citizen of this country got equal rights.
â€œPeople are living a respectful life with the facilities irrespective of the caste...]]>
